name: Energy Tanks
description:
Energy Tanks is a 2 player top-down action tank game that requires the players to think on their toes about what they need to do and where they need to shoot. With fully interactable menus, players will easily understand the base controls of Energy Tanks. After selecting a map to battle each other in, the battle will start! Surrounding the maps are shield generators that help keep players’ shields active. Players will have to take out all the enemy shield generators to be able to destroy the opposing tank. Also on the maps are power ups to aid in achieving victory, each one giving different powers to change your battle plans. Once the final strike has been landed, players are able to restart the battle or choose a different map to play in. However, be careful about where you fire, you never know if your bullets are going to hit your own shield generator, or worse…



  • 2 Player Local PvP
  • 4 selectable maps
  • 6 different power ups to give you an edge against the other player
  • Bullets will ricochet off walls
  • Friendly-fire is always active



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
